structure.unit: FEES AND COMPENSATION OF PUBLIC OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES

law.text: Constables may collect for the following services the following fees: Making arrests for violations involving a motor vehicle on the public highways ................................................................. $0.50 Taking up a vagrant .............................................................................................. .50 Killing a mad dog ................................................................................................ 1.00 Killing and burying a distempered horse, ass or mule ......................................... 3.00 Killing and burying any other cattle, per head ..................................................... 2.00 Altering a stud, jackass or bull ............................................................................. 1.00 Any other services, the same fees allowed sheriffs for similar services.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 30, effective January 2, 1978. -- Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 205, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1733.
